translation.en: One, two, three below!
- Hi. -
Hi.
My name is Aja Tarron of House Tarron,
translation.es: Me llamo Aja Tarron, de la Casa Tarron.

translation.en: and I want to tell you a story. It's a good story.
translation.es: Y quiero contarles una historia. ¡Es muy buena!

translation.en: It is very lively, with lots of humors and excitement.
translation.es: Es muy vivaz. Tiene mucho humor y diversión.

translation.en: It begins someplace very, very, very far from here,
translation.es: Comienza en un sitio muy, muy lejos de aquí.

translation.en: on an entirely different planet called Akiridion- 5.
Twenty on the win!
- Luug, come back now! - You crushed my skill tech.
translation.es: - Luug, vuelve aquí. - Arruinaste mi skelteg.

translation.en: Come back here!
- Sector 7. -
You know, Luug, you are ruining a perfectly lively day.
translation.es: Luug, estás arruinando un día completamente vivaz.

translation.en: Smile and wave. Smile and wave.
- Where is she? It's her ceremony, too. - You know your daughter.
translation.es: - No llegó. Es su ceremonia. - Conoces a tu hija.

translation.en: - Aja's spirited. - Your Majesties.
- Have you found our daughter? - In a manner of speaking.
translation.es: - ¿Encontraste a nuestra hija? - En cierto modo.

translation.en: So, speak.
- It would appear she's run away. - Again?
- You're late. - Sorry, Luug. Totally--
Don't Luug me.
If you don't get here in five mekrons, Mama and Papa will stomp you.
translation.es: Si no llegas en cinco mekrones, te las verás con mamá y papá.

translation.en: I think we both know I won't be there at all.
And we both know I don't want to be queen- in- waiting.
translation.es: Y también, que no quiero ser reina en espera.

translation.en: Ugh! You're running away again? Hey, why are you actually running?
translation.es: ¿Estás escapando otra vez? ¿Por qué huyes exactamente?

translation.en: Luug decided to run away from me.
You're going to miss the ceremony.
Say hi to Mama and Papa.
translation.es: Envíales saludos a mamá y a papá.

translation.en: Krel, my son. I have some bad news.
Aja ran away again and won't be attending the ceremony?
translation.es: ¿Aja volvió a huir y no irá a la ceremonia?

translation.en: - I might have spoken to her. - I'm sorry, my boy.
It's fine. She's a free spirit.
translation.es: Está bien. Es un espíritu libre.

translation.en: One day, you will be king, your mother and I will be gone,
translation.es: Un día serás rey, tu madre y yo no estaremos,

translation.en: and you and Aja will be all the other has.
translation.es: y tú y Aja solo se tendrán el uno al otro.

translation.en: - What if I'm not ready to be a king? - Of course you're not ready to be king.
translation.es: - ¿Y si no estoy listo para ser rey? - No lo estás.

translation.en: No one is ever ready.
What I mean is, what if I'm not good enough?
translation.es: Digo, ¿y si no soy lo suficientemente bueno?

translation.en: If I know anything, my son, it is that life is a series of choices.
translation.es: Si algo sé, hijo mío, es que la vida es una serie de decisiones.

translation.en: It's what we choose in the small moments that makes our lives better or worse.
translation.es: Lo que decimos en los pequeños momentos hace a nuestra vida mejor o peor.

translation.en: You will not face these choices alone because you will always have your family.
translation.es: No enfrentarás las decisiones solo. Siempre tendrás a tu familia.

translation.en: Including your sister, no matter how much she wishes to deny that she's a royal.
translation.es: Incluso a tu hermana, aunque no le agrade ser de la realeza.

translation.en: I did it!
- Impressive. - My liege.
We must begin the ceremony.
We are ready, Lieutenant Zadra.
Speak for yourself.
Come along, Krel, King- in- waiting.
Fine. I'm ready!
- - I guess.
I see you, you little slime- bucket!
Get back here, or I'll have you turned into flexel!
Sorry!
- Oh, my! - Luug, that is not a toy!
translation.es: Luug, esto no es un juguete.

translation.en: - - Luug!
Maybe even flexel is too good for you.
translation.es: Hasta ser flexel es demasiado bueno para ti.

translation.en: For hundreds of keltons, Akiridion- 5 stood divided between two houses.
translation.es: Durante cientos de keltones, Akiridion-5 estuvo dividido en dos casas.

translation.en: The House Akraohm of my ancestors, and House Ventis of my husband's.
translation.es: La Casa Akraohm de mis ancestros y la Casa Ventis de los de mi esposo.

translation.en: Today, we celebrate the joining of these two great houses into House Tarron,
translation.es: Hoy, celebramos la unión de estas dos maravillosas casas en Casa Tarron

translation.en: and declare the heir to the throne to be ready and good.
translation.es: y declaramos que el heredero al trono está listo y dispuesto.

translation.en: This ridge is the mark of our ancestors,
translation.es: Esa es la marca de nuestros ancestros

translation.en: and proclaims you worthy of the crown of Akiridion
translation.es: y te proclama digno de la corona

translation.en: that has stood for righteousness since ages past.
translation.es: que ha sido sinónimo de rectitud desde épocas pasadas.

translation.en: - It is done. -
The King- in- waiting
will now honor the tradition of a demonstration of combat.
translation.es: honrará la tradición con una demostración de combate.

translation.en: Commander Varvatos Vex, step forward.
translation.es: Comandante Varvatos Vex, un paso adelante.

translation.en: Varvatos Vex is prepared to crush.
translation.es: Varvatos Vex está listo para destruir.

translation.en: - Relax. You'll be fine. - And if I don't?
You'll smile and wave. Like so.
Just go easy on me, would you?
Varvatos will give you the honor of a glorious death.
translation.es: Varvatos te dará el honor de una gloriosa muerte.

translation.en: Vex, always with the death.
You do understand this whole thing is just for show, right?
translation.es: Entiendes que es solo una demostración, ¿no?

translation.en: Varvatos will show you glorious death!
Begin!
Varvatos will make this a memorable pummeling.
translation.es: Varvatos hará que sea un aporreo memorable.

translation.en: What? What, what, what?
Oh, yes!
- Oh, no.  -
You always leave your sword- hand side exposed!
translation.es: Dejas expuesta la mano de la espada.

translation.en: You struck Varvatos! Glorious!
Varvatos will reward you with the most remarkable slaying!
translation.es: Varvatos te recompensará con una muerte notable.

translation.en: Vex! Would you permit me the honor of sparring with my son, old friend?
translation.es: ¡Vex! ¿Me permitirías el honor de combatir con mi hijo?

translation.en: - Your serrator, Varvatos. - My liege.
I sparred with my father at my coronation, as he sparred with his father before him.
translation.es: Combatí con mi padre en su coronación como él lo hizo con el suyo.

translation.en: This is a sacred honor, Krel.
What a family.
One day, you'll be able to best me in a duel.
- You might as well begin trying. -
Those are General Morando's Strykers.
Seklos and Gaylen, what's happening?
Seek refuge! Get to the shelter, now!
My lieges, we must return you to the palace at once. We need to find Aja!
translation.es: - Sus altezas, al palacio. - Encontremos a Aja.

translation.en: If the city's defenses do not hold, we cannot guarantee your safety, my royals.
translation.es: Si fracasan las defensas, no podremos mantenerlos a salvo.

translation.en: How did he disable the shield?
- There is a traitor in our midst. - Mama! Papa!
- I'm not leaving you. - You're not leaving us! You're following orders.
translation.es: - No los dejaré. - No nos dejas, sigues órdenes.

translation.en: Now get Vex and Zadra, and go find your sister.
translation.es: Ve con Vex y Zadra, y busca a tu hermana.

translation.en: She needs you now.
Oh, Luug, we've got to hurry!
- Ah! Mama! Mama! Where are you? - Look out!
Are you okay?
Davaros!
Thank you, thank you.
No thanking. Just running!
Glorious death!
Get on!
Luug!
Don't even think about it, you filthy animal.
- What is happening? - It's a coup. General Morando is trying to usurp the throne.
translation.es: - ¿Qué pasa? - Morando quiere usurpar el trono.

translation.en: - Krel, are Mama and Papa-- - Ah!
- We've been hit! We lost firepower! - Cover me!
What? Why? Oh! Because you're trying to kill yourself.
Okay, not so bad.
- Oh, no, no. It's bad. - Just fix it!
Vex, a little help here?
Does Varvatos look busy right now?
Krel! Status!
We have to reroute power from the secondary sub- manifold to the ampule array.
translation.es: Redirijo la potencia del segundo colector a la formación de ampolla.

translation.en: - Target locked. - Krel!
Almost, almost, almost! Got it! Locked and loaded.
translation.es: Casi lo termino. Listo. Cerrado y cargado.

translation.en: Gotcha!
Glorious death to everyone!
Loyal soldiers, Val Morando is a traitor to Akiridion- 5.
translation.es: Soldados leales, Val Morando es un traidor para Akiridion-5.

translation.en: Your standing with him today is an act of high treason.
translation.es: El hecho de que lo acompañen es un acto de alta traición.

translation.en: Is it?
From their perspective, it is treason not to stand with me.
translation.es: Desde su perspectiva, es traición no estar conmigo.

translation.en: I've returned from exile to claim back what is rightfully mine!
translation.es: ¡Regresé del exilio para reclamar lo que es legítimamente mío!

translation.en: The time for empty talk is over!
Now arrives the horvath of action!
Stand fast.
Surrender and I will spare your lives.
translation.es: Ríndanse y les perdonaré la vida.

translation.en: - We can't trust him. - I wasn't planning to.
translation.es: - No podemos confiar en él. - Lo sé.

translation.en: For Akiridion!
For Akiridion!
- Are you scared? - I am now the king- in- waiting.
translation.es: - ¿Tienes miedo? - Ahora soy el rey en espera.

translation.en: I am terrified.
Retreat!
Mama! Papa!
Mama, I'm sorry I ran away again.
There is no time for apologies. You're safe. That's all that matters.
translation.es: No hay tiempo para disculpas. Solo importa que estás a salvo.

translation.en: - Mama! - The Taylon have betrayed us.
translation.es: Mamá. Los Taylon nos traicionaron. Debemos retirarnos.

translation.en: We are forced to retreat. Don't worry!
translation.es: Los Taylon nos traicionaron. Debemos retirarnos.

translation.en: As long as we're together, as long as we remain a family, all will be well.
translation.es: Mientras sigamos juntos y seamos una familia, todo estará bien.

translation.en: And you'll always have us and each other.
translation.es: Siempre nos tendrán a nosotros y se tendrán el uno al otro.

translation.en: My lieges, without the protection of the Taylon, there is nowhere on Akiridion we can guarantee your safety.
translation.es: Sin la protección de los Taylon, no estarán seguros en Akiridion.

translation.en: Lieutenant Zadra is correct. The planet is unsafe.
translation.es: La teniente Zadra tiene razón. El planeta no es seguro.

translation.en: We must leave here at once. Please.
You cannot win, royals.
Surrender to me!
Get to the mother ship!
Fialkov!
Fire!
- - No!
No, Morando! No!
Please, General! No!
- No! - No!
Papa! Mama!
- My king! My queen! - Varvatos...
Will you stand by my side one last time, my friend?
translation.es: ¿Me apoyarás una última vez, mi amigo?

translation.en: I will, my king.
Protect my children with your life, if necessary.
translation.es: Protege a mis hijos con tu vida de ser necesario.

translation.en: No! No!
No!
- Vex, lower the shield. -
- He's taken the royal cores! - We should hurry!
I'll hold them back.
Zadra, hurry!
Vex! You fool!
Take them to the mother ship. Keep safe!
translation.es: Ve a la nave. - Protégelos. - No.

translation.en: No!
Zadra!
Varvatos mourns, too. But grief must wait for survival!
translation.es: Varvatos llora, pero el dolor debe esperar. ¡Hay que sobrevivir!

translation.en: Engines starting.
V- Stryker squadron, engage the mother ship! Destroy them all!
translation.es: Escuadrón V-Stryker, encuentren a la nave nodriza y acaben con todos.

translation.en: We have achieved maximum velocity.
- Wait here. - I had every intention.
- I'll be back. - Unless we explode!
- Yes, yes, unless we explode. - Hang on, King- in- waiting!
translation.es: - Sí, si no explotamos. - Sujétate, rey en espera.

translation.en: Indicate operation.
Mother, save Mama and Papa. Take their cores.
translation.es: Madre, salva a mis padres. Toma los núcleos.

translation.en: - Here. - Initiating reintegration stasis.
Rewriting the King and Queen's molecular code.
Fix them, mother ship. Please fix them!
Time to completion, unknown.
Aja?
- Aja! -
Royals don't need to skulk under the cover of darkness.
translation.es: Los miembros reales no necesitan esconderse.

translation.en: They do when they don't want to be caught staying up past curfew.
translation.es: Salvo cuando ya ha pasado el toque de queda.

translation.en: I can't be what you want me to be. I can't be a royal.
translation.es: No sirvo para ser de la realeza. No soy así.

translation.en: No one gets to choose their station in life, Aja.
translation.es: Nadie elige su rol en la vida, Aja.

translation.en: Maybe I'll be the first.
There are those who would trade their life cores for royalty.
translation.es: Algunos darían sus núcleos por esto.

translation.en: And I would trade my royalty for a life.
translation.es: Yo daría lo que soy por una vida.

translation.en: - A normal life. - You're remarkable, Aja.
translation.es: - Una vida normal. - Eres brillante, Aja.

translation.en: You say that because you're my mother.
Royal or not, you are extraordinary, Aja.
translation.es: De la realeza o no, eres extraordinaria, Aja.

translation.en: That is what you are constantly running away from.
You could leave this palace, fly far away from our world...
translation.es: Podrías abandonar el palacio, alejarte de este mundo...

translation.en: and your destiny would follow you.
Aja, it's going to be all right.
I'm not entirely sure how, but...
translation.es: No estoy seguro de cómo, pero...

translation.en: They're gone.
Our parents.
And it's all my fault.
- Don't be ridiculous. - I ran away.
If I had been on time at the ceremony,
translation.es: Si hubiese llegado a tiempo a la ceremonia,

translation.en: it would have started sooner, which means it would have ended sooner,
translation.es: todo habría empezado antes y habría terminado antes.

translation.en: which means Mama and Papa would have been safe in the palace.
translation.es: Mamá y papá hubiesen estado a salvo.

translation.en: Hey!
And it would have ended sooner if I had done better in the duel.
translation.es: Si hubiese peleado mejor en el duelo, habría terminado antes.

translation.en: If anything, we're both to blame.
translation.es: En todo caso, compartimos la culpa.

translation.en: I miss them already.
So do I.
You look as if you need a hug.
I'll get Varvatos. Varvatos?
Varvatos, little brother, he never hugs.
That's true.
I am Varvatos. Varvatos destroys!
The V- Strykers are not equipped for space travel. We are clear.
translation.es: Los V-Strykers no vuelan por el espacio. Los perdimos.

translation.en: Mother, that won't last long.
We need to head somewhere they won't think to look for us.
translation.es: Vayamos a un sitio donde no piensen buscarnos.

translation.en: The worse the planet, the better for us.
translation.es: Cuanto peor sea el planeta, mejor.

translation.en: I can only locate two planets which fit your description.
translation.es: Hay dos planetas con esa descripción.

translation.en: One is about to be devoured by a black hole.
translation.es: A uno se lo devorará un hoyo negro.

translation.en: Mm. Maybe not that one.
The other is a floating ball of mud and water.
translation.es: El otro, es una pelota de lodo y agua.

translation.en: Its inhabitants named it after dirt.
translation.es: De ahí, el nombre que le dieron.

translation.en: - They call it Earth. - Earth!
It sounds beautiful.
This is going to be quite the adventure.
I wonder what we will find there!
We didn't explode!
Of course not. Varvatos was at the helm.
translation.es: Claro que no. Varvatos estaba al mando.

translation.en: And yet, we're still alive.
- We did it! - Systems damaged.
Engage protective force shield.
Force shield inoperable.
Reroute all power to the camouflage matrix.
translation.es: Envía energía a la matriz de camuflaje.

translation.en: Complying.
I have chosen a model based on the planet's primitive transmissions.
translation.es: El modelo se basa en transmisiones primitivas.

translation.en: They broadcast at sub- light speed, so they're bound to be rather old.
translation.es: No se hicieron a la velocidad de la luz. Será un modelo viejo.

translation.en: Wow. They really put this one up fast.
One of the indigenous life forms is approaching. It may be hostile.
translation.es: Ejemplar de vida autóctona acercándose. Podría ser hostil.

translation.en: He wears massive shields over his eyes.
translation.es: Lleva grandes escudos en los ojos.

translation.en: He must be a dreaded warrior.
Varvatos will slay him!
You cannot kill everyone. We are in hiding.
translation.es: No puedes matar a todos. Nos estamos escondiendo.

translation.en: But for Varvatos, death is a way of life.
translation.es: Pero para Varvatos, la muerte es una forma de vida.

translation.en: - - Hello?
- What is that awful noise? - Make it stop!
Anyone home?
Can I interest you in a subscription to the Arcadia Oaks Ledger?
The cylindrical object in his hand...
- Hello? - ...is it a weapon?
The life form seems quite persistent.
translation.es: La forma de vida es persistente.

translation.en: - We cannot let it see us. - What does that mean?
We are trapped in here forever?
- Of course not! - Hello?
Eventually, we'll be found by Morando's forces
translation.es: Las fuerzas de Morando nos encontrarán

translation.en: and massacred ever so slowly.
He's right.
We have to at least buy time for the ship to repair Mama and Papa.
translation.es: Necesitamos tiempo para que la nave repare a mamá y a papá.

translation.en: Mother ship, what is the state of the transduction chambers?
Nominal. What is your question?
You can reconfigure our energies into a form
- that resembles this planet's life forms. - They call themselves humans.
translation.es: - y asimilarnos a los autóctonos. - Se llaman humanos.

translation.en: Mother, you have to design forms for us that no one will ever pay attention to.
translation.es: Madre, diséñanos formas a las que nadie les preste atención.

translation.en: You need to make us invisible!
I have chosen three forms that people on the mud planet tend to ignore.
translation.es: Escogí tres formas que la gente de aquí suele ignorar.

translation.en: The first of such invisible forms is a girl.
translation.es: La primera forma invisible es una chica.

translation.en: Girls here are invisible?
The next is called a Latino.
translation.es: La otra forma se llama latino.

translation.en: I don't understand. What is La- tino?
That sounds fantastic. It sounds rather regal.
translation.es: Se oye fantástico. Parece bastante majestuoso.

translation.en: You, Commander Vex, will be reconfigured as... a senior citizen.
translation.es: A ti, comandante Vex, te reconfiguraré como un anciano.

translation.en: Glorious! Varvatos should be senior to all.
translation.es: ¡Glorioso! Varvatos debería ser superior a todos.

translation.en: All three forms sound like winners!
All right, maybe you're not home.
translation.es: Bueno, quizá no estén en casa.

translation.en: I'll just leave a complimentary copy here.
- Prepare to be destroyed, who- man! -
translation.es: Prepárate a que te destruya, hu-mono.

translation.en: So, you see, things did not go exactly according to plan for us.
translation.es: Como ven, las cosas no nos salieron conforme al plan.

translation.en: But they weren't going according to plan for General Morando, either.
translation.es: Pero tampoco salieron conforme al plan de Morando.

translation.en: Say that again.
We couldn't track the mother ship. It must've been some kind of cloaking device.
translation.es: Imposible rastrear la nave. Debieron camuflarla.

translation.en: That's what I thought you said.
translation.es: Es lo que me pareció escuchar.

translation.en: There's no place in the galaxy the royals can hide that is beyond my reach.
translation.es: No hay sitio en esta galaxia donde puedan esconderse sin que los encuentre.

translation.en: Assemble the bounty hunters. No one can survive them.
translation.es: Reúnan a los cazarrecompensas. Nadie sobrevive a ellos.
